name: Lauren Schlau Consulting
tagline: Los Angeles Market Research and Consulting Firm
description:
Lauren Schlau Consulting is the Los Angeles based boutique market research and consulting firm known for its expertise and experience serving select clientele engaged in travel/tourism, hospitality, downtown districts, retail, and cultural arts sectors, related to economic development.
We are recognized and respected for reliable, applicable and actionable custom research and providing insight beyond the numbers to help clients develop and execute effective research based strategy.
